text: Sui Allohi jagona ʙarmegardad ilmi vuqu'i qijomat (ja'ne, soati ʙarposavii qijomatro tanho Alloh medonad). Va hec mevae az ƣilofi xes ʙerun nameojad va hec modae homila namesavadu namezojad, magar on ki U ta'olo ʙa on ogoh ast. Va ruzi qijomat, ki Alloh musrikonro nido dihad, ki sarikoni Man kucojand? Gujand: «Ogohat kardem, ki nest hec kase az mo xuvohi dihad, ki Tu ʙo xud sarike dorj va imruz mo hama jaktoparast hastem
